alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Coast; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 20 at 10:53PM PST until December 21 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST THURSDAY BELOW 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast, Lower Columbia, Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley. In Washington, Willapa Hills, South Washington Coast, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will primarily affect valley locations below 1500 feet in elevation.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Pedestrians and cyclists should wear bright or reflective clothing to increase the chance of being seen by others in the dense fog.

area.areaDesc: Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Coast; Willapa Hills
